item.title: Basic Syntax
item.author: kenya@spanishstation.net (Kenya Ahuatzi)
item.description: Headings To create a heading, add number signs (#) in front of a word or phrase. The number of number signs you use should correspond to the heading level. For example, to create a heading level three (h3), use three number signs (e.
